::Cerberus/Four Nightmares/Nemean Hydra::

    "Enough of this," Cerberus s=
aid. "Either you allow me to lead you to a glorious victory, or I take the =
Destrons by force."
    He stood on a Rock. He looked at all the Destron in=
 the area. Then he began to talk.
    "Attention Destrons! Magmatron is gon=
e, and in his place was Shredder. But Shredder was not a fit leader, others=
 came and tried to take his place. You had a mini Civil War. For what point=
? We are all fighting for the same goal. To win Earth. That said I am prese=
nting myself as leader. My name is Cerberus, and these are my Four Nightmar=
es. We are going to find a new base, and then begin to take out the faction=
s one by one. If there are any objections I would love to here them now, no=
t with a shot in my back."
    The Four Nightmares transformed to robot mod=
e and pulled they're weapons. They were standing around Cerberus ready to d=
efend him if nessary. Nemean Hydra finally decided to show his alternate fo=
rm. He transformed from a Lion to a Hydra, all Seven heads loomed proud. He=
 shot fire at the ground from all of them, turning the ground into glass.
